alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Karnes (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 13 at 6:10AM CDT until May 18 at 10:14AM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Austin/San Antonio TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge affecting Goliad and Karnes Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Antonio River at Hwy 72 nr Runge. * WHEN...From this evening to late Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 39.0 feet, Water is well into the floodplain. No impacts to roads or structures. Cattle and farm equipment should have been removed from the floodplain or face the threat of being cut off or lost. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:15 AM CDT Saturday the stage was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river will rise above flood stage late this evening and crest at 37.9 feet by Monday morning. It will then fall below moderate flood stage by Tuesday morning and drop below flood stage late Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 38.6 feet on 07/09/2021. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sun Mon Tue San Antonio River Hwy 72 nr Runge 27.0 13.4 Sat 4 am CDT 31.7 37.9 30.3 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 700 PM CDT.
